body: A Succubus without tail, and, that thing... Sound like the one that name "C3" on the clearnet to me.
Nice.
So the guy's dad just sends him succubuses?
10/10 artwork. You are a god.

One more Napata's work, full of foreplay and relation-love development that makes the guy in question value the female who provides him with sex, a work that should be shown in the open, not the trash available in the store shelves: buy, buy, buy, celebrities, guns, religion, junk news, etc. Let's support sensei like Napata!
the artwork are great but sadly the censoring are too heavy...

That ending reminded of a trap doujin I stumbled upon on fakku. The one where the guy wanted to lose his virginity but accidentally summoned an incubus. The story was so great, that most comments were "Great, time to question my sexuality again." Argh.. I can't remember the title! Someone help me!
OMG the tit translators, that reminds of an episode of Highschool DxD where the main character Issei can anticipate a girls attack by looking at their boobs, yeah cause why not
The freaking glint on page 11
Omg Napata top,1 i want something like that, i mean girl from another world or something like her !
Yay, someone finally translated it! Thank you!

@flatbear - If you're using chrome try this extension waa.ai/MangaViewer it loads all the pages and it also has the option to make it so that you can read by scrolling and it works on a ton of hentai websites (including this website). @Nekrozys - All Hail HENTAI!
@suicide: I actually prefer hentai in imgur since it loads much faster and reliably than say fakku or ge hentai and I can scroll instead of click.  Thanks for the hentai.cafe link!
@suicide thanks for sharing. May Hentai prevail.
@flatbear - Thanks, though reading hentai in imgur feels weird for some reason... And also I've found a website that has all fakku subscription manga only, if anyone's interested > Hentai.cafe
@suicide: /r/doujinshi, /r/hentai, also http://tokyotosho.info/ can be a helpful resource.
@flatbear & @Nekrozys - Where do you guys find these?! (and thanks for the links)
